title: Mastering JavaScript Fundamentals Through Coding
description: In this lab, we will explore JavaScript programming concepts and practice implementing them through coding exercises. The lab aims to help beginners gain a deeper understanding of JavaScript syntax, data types, control flow, and functions. By the end of the lab, you will have honed your coding skills and be ready to tackle more complex JavaScript projects.

meta.title: Mastering JavaScript Fundamentals Through Coding
meta.description: Explore JavaScript programming concepts and practice implementing them through coding exercises.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, syntax, coding, data types, javascript lab, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
